graphql.query:
mutation ($payload:IamCreateAccountInput!)
{
	iamCreateAccount (payload:$payload)
	{
		id
		type
		email
		isActive
		clientId
		dApplicationCodes
		dPermissions
		dTenants
		data
	}
}

graphql.query:
query ($query:QueryStatement)
{
	iamGetAccounts (query: $query)
	{
		id
		type
		email
		isActive
		clientId
		dApplicationCodes
		dPermissions
		dTenants
		data
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

query ($query:QueryStatement)
{
	iamFindAccount (query: $query)
	{
		id
		type
		email
		isActive
		clientId
		dApplicationCodes
		dPermissions
		dTenants
		data
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

query ($id:ID)
{
	iamFindAccountById (id:$id)
	{
		id
		type
		email
		isActive
		clientId
		dApplicationCodes
		dPermissions
		dTenants
		data
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

mutation ($payload:IamUpdateAccountInput!)
{
	iamUpdateAccount (payload:$payload)
	{
		id
		type
		email
		isActive
		clientId
		dApplicationCodes
		dPermissions
		dTenants
		data
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

mutation ($id:ID!)
{
	iamDeleteAccountById (id:$id)
	{
		id
		type
		email
		isActive
		clientId
		dApplicationCodes
		dPermissions
		dTenants
		data
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

mutation ($query:QueryStatement)
{
	iamDeleteAccounts (query: $query)
	{
		id
		type
		email
		isActive
		clientId
		dApplicationCodes
		dPermissions
		dTenants
		data
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}
